message: I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more. This offer is reasonable considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58% for me
The inflation is hurting us both. I'm willing to meet closer to the middle ground to reach a deal before it's too late.
Middle ground is 50/50, I'm still being generous at 57% for me
This is ridiculous. It has to be 50/50 now.  Any more rounds and the inflation will eat us both alive.
